ack.p: Authors wish to specially thank the following people for their recognized support in providing us with some data: Awodayo ADEPITI from the Department of Pharmacognosy, Faculty of Pharmacy, Obafemi Awolowo University, NIGERIA; Ayodele Oluwatosin, Shephrah Ogungbesan (Chrisland University, Abeokuta, Nigeria); Akinseinde Ebenezer Akindele (University of Ibadan, Nigeria) and Akhigbe Kelvin (University of Ilorin, Nigeria).
